title: Meganom Polygraph
keywords: printing, paper bags, cardboard bags, logo bags, gift bags, kraft bags, embossed bags, heat sealed bags, designer bags, UV varnish bags, branded folders, custom bags, business packaging, eco-friendly packaging, promotional bags, branded bags

home.home-page-description: Meganom Polygraph is a manufacturer of high-quality paper and cardboard bags in large and small print runs. Bags with logos, gift bags, kraft bags, embossed and debossed bags, designer bags, and other services for your business. We offer custom-made products at competitive prices with high quality.
home.home-hero-services: Laminated paper bags ⋅ Logo bags ⋅ Kraft bags ⋅ Gift bags ⋅ Embossed and debossed bags ⋅ Designer paper bags ⋅ Spot UV lacquer bags ⋅ Branded document folders
home.home-services-paper-bags-laminated-descr: Custom laminated bags made of coated paper with rope handles
home.home-services-logo-bags-description: We print your logo or any image on advertising bags
home.home-services-cardboard-bags-description: Custom cardboard bags are durable and have an elegant look
home.home-services-kraft-bags-description: Kraft bags are an eco-friendly packaging solution at a budget-friendly price
home.home-services-gift-bags-description: We are Ukrainian manufacturers of gift bags for all occasions
home.home-services-branded-folders-descriptio: Branded folders with embossing or printing are an essential element of a company's style
home.home-services-designer-paper-bags-descri: Designer paper or cardboard bags are made using die-cutting
home.home-services-uv-lacquer-bags-descriptio: A bag with UV lacquer will effectively highlight your company’s logo
home.home-services-embossed-bags-description: Embossing and debossing on bags add a unique appearance
home.home-contact-form-contact-error: Please provide at least one contact
home.home-contact-form-message-placeholder: Specify the bag size, material, printing, and quantity
home.home-contact-form-error: Sorry... it looks like an error occurred
home.home-contact-form-sending-error: An error occurred while sending the message

about.about-page-description: Manufacturing and production of bags in Kyiv on order. Individual approach, fast order execution - Meganom Polygraph.
about.about-paragraph-first: Since our founding in 2000, we have chosen a development vector that we successfully adhere to: the paper and cardboard bags we produce must be of the highest possible quality. We do not manufacture bags at the lowest prices – we create high-quality products at competitive prices.
about.about-paragraph-second: With our own production facilities equipped with modern machinery and quality control at every stage of production, as well as well-established and reliable connections with both Ukrainian and international suppliers, we can guarantee our clients favorable cooperation terms and long-term partnerships.
about.about-paragraph-third: Meganom Polygraph offers you a wide range of high-quality paper and cardboard bags that are perfect for various purposes, whether it be product packaging, promotional materials, or corporate gifts. Our products are distinguished not only by their high quality but also by stylish designs that attract attention and enhance your brand.
about.about-paragraph-fourth: The main difference between our company and competitors is that, as of today, the products we offer have the best price-to-quality ratio on the Ukrainian market. Many customers and regular clients have already appreciated this and our other advantages.

delivery.delivery-kyiv-paragraph-first: Product delivery is discussed individually with the manager.
delivery.delivery-kyiv-paragraph-second: Product shipment time is from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM on business days.
delivery.delivery-ukraine-paragraph-first: Delivery of products to other cities and regions of Ukraine is carried out by the 'Nova Poshta' courier service. The delivery cost is calculated individually according to the carrier’s tariffs, depending on the weight, dimensions of the shipment, and destination region. The delivery payment is made by the customer upon receipt of the goods.
delivery.delivery-ukraine-paragraph-second: Please review the delivery conditions on the carrier’s website: "Nova Poshta"

example.example-page-description: Meganom Polygraph printing house - examples of work. Full service cycle: design preparation and production.
example.example-paper-bags-laminated-page-descri: Bags made of coated paper with a density of 150 g/m², 170 g/m², 200 g/m², 250 g/m², covered with glossy or matte film (matte or glossy lamination). Offset printing. The bottom and handles are reinforced with 400 g/m² cardboard. Handles: polypropylene or polyester cord with filling, 5 mm diameter.
example.example-logo-bags-page-description: This packaging is ideal for advertising. Logos or any images can be applied to the bags. Branded paper bags enhance the company's image, increase brand recognition, and demonstrate that the company cares about its customers.
example.example-cardboard-bags-page-description: We recommend this type of bag to our clients for heavy products. Cardboard packaging is strong and allows carrying outerwear, bottles, etc., while ensuring it can withstand the weight. Moreover, printing on cellulose-coated cardboard meets high-quality standards.
example.example-kraft-bags-page-description: Branded kraft bags reflect the company's awareness, set you apart from competitors, and convey your brand's values. Kraft bags are eco-friendly packaging with a paper density of 80 g/m², 100 g/m², 110 g/m², 120 g/m², 170 g/m², in brown or white, with twisted handles or a 0.5 mm cord.
example.example-gift-bags-page-description: This is the business card of your gift. A bright or restrained design creates a magical mood. We have a wide selection of sizes and layouts for any gift and for any holiday or meeting. You can learn about the entire product range from our managers.
example.example-branded-folders-page-description: Necessary for exchanging documents with clients, participating in seminars and conferences. A branded folder is used as an advertising element; it can include a company QR code, information about services, or promotions. A branded folder is an essential element of a company's style.
example.example-designer-paper-bags-page-descrip: They differ significantly from standard packaging types. They are durable and attract attention, created to emphasize your company's individuality. When choosing designer paper for the bag, consider the color, texture, and density. Minimum order quantity: 50 pcs.
example.example-uv-lacquer-bags-page-description: Stylish and creative, it attracts attention and is memorable for a long time. A varnish is applied to a matte surface, which hardens under ultraviolet light and acquires a glossy finish. Selective UV varnish is applied to design elements that need to be emphasized or advantageously highlighted. Selective UV varnish stands out significantly on dark matte surfaces.
example.example-page-embossed-bags-description: They add luxury and elegance to your products. Despite their affordability, they have a premium look with an impressive design. Foil stamping of a logo or text on the bag surface is done using special foil and heated matrices. Debossing is the process of creating a relief image on the material surface (paper or cardboard) using a stamp and counter-stamp. Minimum order quantity: 100 pcs.
example.example-description: Explore examples of our products created in various styles and technologies. We offer high-quality packaging and branded products to choose from: Laminated Paper Bags, Branded Logo Bags, Cardboard Bags, Kraft Bags, Gift Bags, Branded Folders, Designer Paper Bags, UV Lacquer Bags, Embossed Bags
example.example-paper-bags-laminated-description: Bags made of coated paper with a density of 150 g/m², 170 g/m², 200 g/m², 250 g/m², covered with glossy or matte film (matte or glossy lamination). Offset printing. Bottom and handles reinforced with 400 g/m² cardboard. Handles: polypropylene or polyester cord with filler, diameter 5 mm.
example.example-logo-bags-description: This packaging is perfect for advertising. Logos or any images can be applied to the bags. Branded paper bags enhance a company’s image, increase brand recognition, and demonstrate care for customers.
example.example-cardboard-bags-description: We recommend this bag option for heavy products. Cardboard packaging is durable, allowing it to carry outerwear, bottles, etc., with confidence that it will support the weight. At the same time, printing on cellulose-coated cardboard meets high-quality standards.
example.example-kraft-bags-description: Branded kraft bags reflect a company's environmental awareness, distinguish you from competitors, and communicate your brand values. Kraft bags are eco-friendly packaging with a paper density of 80 g/m², 100 g/m², 110 g/m², 120 g/m², 170 g/m², available in brown or white, with twisted handles or a 5 mm cord.
example.example-gift-bags-description: This is the business card of your gift. A bright or subtle design creates a magical atmosphere. We offer a wide range of sizes and templates for any gift and any occasion or meeting. You can find the full range of products from our managers.
example.example-branded-folders-description: Essential for document exchange with clients, participation in seminars, and conferences. A branded folder serves as an advertising element, allowing a QR code, company service information, or promotional offers to be applied. A branded folder is an important part of a company’s style.
example.example-designer-paper-bags-description: Significantly different from standard types of packaging. They are durable, attract attention, and are designed to emphasize your company's uniqueness. When choosing designer paper for a bag, consider color, texture, and density. Minimum order quantity: 50 pcs.
example.example-uv-lacquer-bags-description: Stylish and creative, they attract attention and leave a lasting impression. A lacquer is applied to the matte surface, which hardens under ultraviolet light and gains a glossy finish. Selective UV lacquer highlights or accentuates design elements. It stands out especially well on dark matte surfaces.
example.example-embossed-bags-description: They add luxury and elegance to your products. Despite being affordable, they have a premium look with a striking design. Foil stamping of a logo or text onto the bag surface is done using special foil and heated matrices. Debossing creates a relief image on the surface (paper or cardboard) using a stamp and counter-stamp. Minimum order quantity: 100 pcs.

contacts.contacts-page-description: Contacts of the printing house for bag production: phone numbers, email, address, and messengers.

error.404-error-message: Unfortunately, the page {url} you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
error.403-error-message: Sorry, but you do not have permission to access the page {url}.
error.default-error-message: Something went wrong while trying to access the page {url}.
error.error-standard-message: Please check the URL for correctness or use the options below.
